tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Thanks to the entire staff of Kasper clinic for being so professional and friendly. I can’t thank enough for the  treatment I have gone through I highly recommend the doctor

****** *** **** *** all the time she was not available. When we went with the appointment, she said busy and there was no appointment. Doctor behaviour was good but the only thing is there was only one pediatrician so I think she is busy other than she is good. I visited for vaccination and there was not much waiting time for the doctor. I would like to give a rating of 5/5.

I am satisfied with doctor treatment and I visited for my daughter for a vaccination. But the consultation, billing and vaccination was not professional but its ok fine. Doctor behaviour was good and she listened to our problem properly. I would like to recommend this doctor to others and there was waiting time around 45 minute and I would like to give a rating of 7/10.

I visited for my kid as he was suffering from cold and cough. Doctor prescribed medicine, it was helpful to cure the problem but it took a bit more time to recover. There was normal waiting time for the doctor. I consulted 2-3 times with this doctor and I am satisfied with the doctor treatment and I would like to give a rating of 8/10.

I have been consulting this doctor from past 6 months and she is good. I visited for a baby vaccination. There was not much waiting time to consult the doctor and I would like to recommend this doctor to others. When it comes to improvement, everything was good and I would like to give a rating of 5/5 star.

Visited for - emergency 
Can’t thank dr.Arul Selvi mam and staff of Kasper enough for their service at the time of such emergency. Best hospital in indranagar .
No unnecessary medicines and proper explanation with a friendly approach.Would recommend for all those who needs a family kids doctor.

*** ** * **** **** ******* I visited due to fever treatment *** *** ** **** ** ********** I would like to recommend this doctor to other patients. Doctor behaviour was good and there was not much waiting time to consult the doctor and I would like to give a rating 8/10.

Treatment was good, I went 3-4 times to this hospital for baby vaccination and the treatment was good. I would like to recommend this doctor to others. There was not much waiting time to consult the doctor and I would like to give a rating to the hospital 4.5 /5 stars and everything was good in the hospital.
Can't thank Dr. Arul Selvi mam and staff of Kasper enough for their services at the time of such of emergency. **** ******** ** **********
